content: this pattern was designed in honor of mathilde jurgensen after reading her mother s memoir *the disappearance a primer of loss* ------------------------------------------------- **details** * pattern consists of 15 rounds * level is advanced * stitches/terms slip_stitch chain single_crochet double_crochet csdc tc fp/bp decrease picot * your gauge will determine things like hook size yardage finished size and height of stitches any of these things can be adjusted as needed ---------------------------------------------- **languages** this pattern is available in english and russian if you are able and desire to translate the pattern into your native language please use this form to contact me 1 only authorized translations are permitted * *russian language translation provided by ula tomaszewska and tested by tatyana norri and наталья коваленко * ------------------------------------------ **community** join our discussion and support group for designs by grace fearon on facebook 2 join our discord channel 3 _____________ 1 http //www gracefearon com/pattern-translator-application 2 https //www facebook com/groups/878254922303627/ 3 https //discord gg/atndgvj
